price: Namni kitaaba isaa dugdaisaa duubaan kenname immoo;
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
